name: Patricia A. ROSKI, Administratrix of the Estate of Walter Roski, Deceased v. HALFWAY HOUSE, INC., Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
parties: Patricia A. ROSKI, Administratrix of the Estate of Walter Roski, Deceased v. HALFWAY HOUSE, INC., Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Richard S. March, Albert B. Gerber, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Louis Lipschitz, Joseph R. Danella, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
599 A.2d 647
Patricia A. ROSKI, Administratrix of the Estate of Walter Roski, Deceased v. HALFWAY HOUSE, INC., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 24, 1991.
Decided Nov. 22, 1991.
Richard S. March, Albert B. Gerber, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Louis Lipschitz, Joseph R. Danella, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
